overview: After yet another breakup, Mitch gets intervened on by his closest friends and steered towards therapy as an option to break his various self-sabotaging cycles. Battling his problems with communication, fear, depression, and anxiety, Mitch reaches a breaking point and in a moment of impulsivity, he adopts a miniature horse that has dwarfism and anxiety issues.
title: Reggie: A Millennial Depression Comedy
